title: Down the Shore
description: A fairytale believer of true love, and not the one night stand, Abby vows to keep her virginity until she meets the one. That is easier said than done when she has two boys competing for her time and affection. Abby is convinced she is the last eighteen year old virgin still living. Never being inclined to be a notch on someone's bed post, the thought didn't bother her...much.
author: Kelly Mooney
